description: This is the main entry point for a Spring Boot application, configuring the backend API. It includes annotations for Spring Boot initialization and a main method to start the application, with comments indicating environment-specific configurations.

classes.name: backendapiApplication
classes.description: Main application class annotated with SpringBootApplication, serving as the entry point for the backend API.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Static method that launches the Spring Boot application.
